bioconda.name: bamtocov
bioconda.summary: Extract coverage information from BAM files, supporting stranded and physical coverage and streams.

biotools.summary: Tools to extract coverage informations from BAM (and CRAM) files, based on the covtobed algorithm that supports stranded coverage and physical coverage, input from streams and uses a memory-efficient algorithm.

bioschemas.name: bamtocov
bioschemas.summary: Tools to extract coverage informations from BAM (and CRAM) files, based on the covtobed algorithm that supports stranded coverage and physical coverage, input from streams and uses a memory-efficient algorithm.
